name: SubsPlease DarkGreen
description: A green-accented dark mode for the SubsPlease website. Some variables such as colors and border radius are tweakable at the top of the stylesheet.
additional_info:
----
2020 Oct 18
----
- Styled the preview image overlay for shows
- Trialing icons beside a few headers on the front page

- Styled text selection
- Responsive styling
- Restyling for site changes

- Styled the airing schedule sidebar checkmarks to fit the style

----
- Fix for site changes

- Modified some colors slightly

2020 Oct 13
----
- Moved root variables to their own section
- Completely styled XDCC Packlist to match the site style (uses root variables)
- Fixed a bug with the XDCC Packlist search bar being out of view when scrolling
